00059                                         // ierr  = 0    --> successful return.
00060                                         // ierr .gt. 0  --> zero pivot encountered at step number ierr.
00061                                         // ierr  = -1   --> Error. input matrix may be wrong.
00062                                         //                  (The elimination process has generated a
00063                                         //                  row in L or U whose length is .gt.  n.)
00064                                         // ierr  = -2   --> The matrix L overflows the array al.

00066                                         // ierr  = -4   --> Illegal value for lfil.
